alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 4:44PM CDT until July 12 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cleburne County in north central Arkansas... North central White County in central Arkansas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 444 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pangburn, or 13 miles north of Searcy, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pangburn... Steprock... Albion... Clay... Providence... Dewey... Sunnydale... Velvet Ridge... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
